name: GoldenEye With Mario Characters
summary: A mod for GoldenEye that replaces all of the characters with ones from the Mario universe along with edited dialog to make more sense with the characters, however the story itself is mainly the same as the original. Some minor changes have been made to the levels to work better with the characters, as well as incorporate scrapped and/or new content.
